summary: TGA HD revival is a high quality retexture for all thieves guild armor (male and female ordinary, m/f guild master armor, etc.)
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/b4/f6/b4f669e0dcbbb73cd1f86b726acaff3b.png[/img][/url][/center]


[font=Georgia][size=4]TGA HD revival is a high quality retexture for all thieves guild armor (male and female ordinary, m/f guild master armor, etc.) I think that this armor deserves attention, so I tried to make it better.
ATTENTION: YOU SHOULD DOWNLOAD THE MAIN TGD REVIVAL PACK FIRST TO USE LINWI'S AND KARLIA'S ARMOR RETEXTURES
=============
Coming soon:

=============
[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/22/cd/22cdc7a85b1870d391197c87e0a40bb8.png[/img][/url]

Extract texture files into your DATA folder.
Overwrite old files if it will be necessary

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/4d/ce/4dce7094d1e2c1f80cda9ebb20814525.png[/img][/url]

Do not reupload textures to other sites without permission. If you want to share files, contact me first. I don't want to see any part of it modified and shared on nexus or other sites without permission.
Texture files are onle for private use and personal edition.[/size][/font]

[youtube]9Pk0YDq53hE[/youtube] [youtube]_T9V6np9juA[/youtube]
[youtube]NtSaw8YjoXs[/youtube] [youtube]LKbMpw-Mc-k[/youtube]
